Title: ✅[ANN] [Pre-TGE] Pixie (PXE) Discover, Pay and Earn Rewards – Download the App!

A project must have real-world uses or applications otherwise it can just be an exercise of futility or in the case of many ICOs just made-up to haul millions into their scamming purse. Pixie can be different and if the team will follow what they have envisioned (the roadmap) then this project can be leaving many legacies for the future generation of entrepreneur to appreciate. I rarely appreciate ICO projects these days but this is one that I like. I am looking for the formal bounty program aside from the airdrop in Twitter...if that can be possible. Thanks a lot.

Pixie is a fully operational discovery, payment and reward platform that connects independent businesses to people, so they can trade freely, quickly and securely anywhere in the world.  What is PXE? The PXE token will underpin our growing community of independent businesses and local explorers across the globe by providing a decentralised local currency that allows direct payments and rewards between them.  Find out more: https://pixietoken.co/

Author: pixietoken
Title: ✅[ANN] [Pre-TGE] Pixie (PXE) Discover, Pay and Earn Rewards – Download the App!
Body: Download Pixie Today, for free, from the App Store or Google Play  WHITEPAPER | BUSINESS PLAN |  WEBSITE EMAIL | DISCORD | TWITTER | FACEBOOK  Pixie is a discovery, payment and reward platform that connects independent businesses to people, so they trade freely, quickly and securely anywhere in the world.   In a world where values and culture are being diluted, meaningful connections become more important than ever before, and connections are driven by experiences. Independent businesses are at the heart of our communities and when they thrive, we all thrive. They provide us with a common ground and introduce us to people and places where connections can be made. From meeting a friend for a coffee to traditional markets, festivals, local events, community groups, social enterprises and everything in between.  Whether it’s your local bakers, street vendors or B&B we believe that where, how and why you spend your time and money matters now more than ever. It helps to build connections. It brings people back into communities to discover and experience a world full of interesting and unique people. We are striving to connect communities of independent businesses across the world by providing a unique platform to help people discover, pay and get rewarded wherever they go. In doing so, we want to create a more local world where you can feel like a local wherever you find yourself. Imagine a world where millions of people can seamlessly discover, pay and get rewarded across a global community of independent businesses. And all done simply through their smartphone, backed by a decentralised tailor-made cryptocurrency.  Pixie started as an idea back in 2013 when the founder, Greg Barden, was on a mission to create a more local world. In 2017, Pixie launched its first app and began trading. As Pixie continues to expand with over £100,000 of transactions already taken place, Greg believes it's now the right time to begin the next phase for Pixie. Today Pixie supports a number of local communities from artisan coffee shops to local events to street vendors, we believe that where, how and why you spend your time and money matters more than ever. It helps to build connections. It brings people back into communities to discover and experience a world full of interesting and unique people.   We are LIVE! Download Pixie Today, for free, from the App Store or Google Play   WHITEPAPER | BUSINESS PLAN |  WEBSITE EMAIL | DISCORD | TWITTER | FACEBOOK   Who is the Pixie Token for? YOU, ME & EVERYONE!  From fashion boutiques, coffee shops, butchers, to artisan traders at street markets, Pixie believes that where, how and why you spend your time and money matters; It helps to build connections. It brings people back into communities to discover a local world full of interesting & unique independent businesses & people to experience and connect to.   The Case for Cryptocurrency  Pivoting from our existing centralised architecture to a decentralised model will allow the business to scale rapidly and globally. Taking advantage of frictionless, fast and low-fee transactions will allow Pixie to reach into new territories.   Pixie will create a dual wallet for users, retaining the existing e-money wallet for day-to-day transactions, and then creating a new open and transparent cryptocurrency wallet through our Pixie token.  This dual-wallet approach gives businesses the stability of taking day-to-day payments in fiat currencies, whilst simultaneously introducing cryptocurrencies to users in a safe and exciting way by awarding Pixie Tokens for transactions.  Over time we foresee that cryptocurrencies will become established and mainstream, and during this period we anticipate that use of the Pixie Tokens will increase, and that trust in the cryptocurrency space, in general, will increase.   Pixie Token Specifications:  Whitelist Process Opens: Tuesday. 3rd of July 10.00am BST. Token Sale Opens: Wednesday, 1st August 10.00am BST. Token Sale Closes: Wednesday, 31st October 10.00am BST. Token Information: Pixie Tokens (PXE) will become a value of exchange for goods and services within the Pixie platform. Maximum Supply: 100,000,000,000 PXE. Type: ERC20 token (to be replaced with Stellar-based PXE token when the Pixie platform launches). Token Pricing: 1 ETH = 396,039 PXE. Accepted Currencies: ETH. Soft Cap (including private): 2,650 ETH. Hard Cap (including private & pre-sale): 101,000 ETH. KYC: All participants are required to verify their identity before participating. Exclusion: Due to legal and regulatory uncertainty, residents and citizens of the US, China and South Korea are blocked from participating.   Pixie Token Pre-Sale:  Our Token Sale will act as the catalyst for the growth of the Pixie cryptocurrency. We will offer a pre-sale of the Pixie Token (PXE) by issuing a temporary ERC20 token which will be tradeable on completion of the Token Sale through listed exchanges. When the Pixie Platform launches, the ERC20 token will be superseded with a new Stellar-based PXE token. Contributors will be asked to exchange their ERC20 tokens for the new Stellar- based PXE token at this time.   Pixie Token Roadmap:    Overview   For Merchants  The increasing encroachment of chain stores to high streets across the western world has pushed up ground rents and rates to a prohibitive degree, forcing independent businesses to locate further away from the centre of towns. The reduced footfall of these areas causes a discovery problem--how to attract new customers in-store when they are harder to find? Merchants have many options for taking payments in-store, but none are tailored specifically towards independent businesses, and merchants perceive that they are getting poor value for money for the service provided. There is a desire for a lightweight, fast and cost-effective alternative. Merchants lack a means to rewards customers in a cost-effective way, without having to buy expensive hardware solutions, or fall back to basic paper-and-stamp loyalty cards. It’s very difficult for a small independent business to collect and utilise customer data in a meaningful way compared to the intelligent systems that big chain store franchises have available to them.  For Customers  Customers value having a unique and positive experience in-store, instead of the bland, homogenous experience of chain stores. There is no single curated guide to independent businesses that customers can use to locate this kind of experience easily. There is no way to be rewarded for supporting independent businesses, and no way for a customer to demonstrate their affection for independent businesses and the variety, experience and quality they bring. Payment options are very limited in independent businesses, often requiring customers to walk to the nearest cashpoint to pay for smaller items (due to the high charges levied on smaller purchases for the merchant).   Vision  The vision is for Pixie to become established as a payment platform of choice for independent businesses, and a one-stop solution for customers to discover, pay, and earn rewards at independent businesses across the globe.   The Pixie Platform comprises three aspects of Discovery, Payment, and Rewards, to provide a ‘virtuous cycle’ for merchants and customers.    Meet The Team  The team at Pixie is on a mission to create a more local world.    Token Distribution  The Pixie token will be distributed as outlined below.   (1) 40% of Tokens will be allocated to contributors and will be transferable at the end of the Token Sale. (2) 30% of Tokens will be set aside as a reserve to strategically raise further funds to ensure international growth of Pixie is achieved. (3) 20% of Tokens will be allocated to a Community Distribution fund, used to incentivise users for use and to sign up to Pixie in new territories. (4) 9% of Tokens will be allocated to the team, long term investors, and third parties. (5) 1% of Tokens will be allocated to a Bounty Fund, used to award early investors with bonus Pixie Tokens during private and pre- token sale phases of the Token Sale.  Number of Tokens           Token Sale   40%   40,000,000,000 Reserve 30% 30,000,000,000 Community Distribution 20% 20,000,000,000 Team, Advisors & Shareholders 9% 9,000,000,000 Community Bounties 1% 1,000,000,000 - Total (Maximum Supply) 100% 100,000,000,000 - Hard Cap $50,000,000 Soft Cap $1,300,000   Exchange Listings  The list of Exchanges that the Pixie Token will be available from will be announced shortly. Discussions are already taking place with a number of Exchanges.   ERC20 Token Swap  Our Token Sale will act as the catalyst for the growth of the Pixie cryptocurrency. We will offer a pre-sale of the Pixie Token (PXE) by issuing a temporary ERC20 token which will be tradeable on completion of the Token Sale through listed exchanges. When the Pixie Platform launches, the ERC20 token will be superseded with a new Stellar-based PXE token. Contributors will be asked to exchange their ERC20 tokens for the new Stellar- based PXE token at this time.   GitHub Repository  The Pixie Token Smart Contracts can be viewed on the public GitHub repository.  Link: https://github.com/PixieMe/pixie-tge-smart-contracts    We are LIVE! Download Pixie Today, for free, from the App Store or Google Play  WHITEPAPER | BUSINESS PLAN |  WEBSITE EMAIL | DISCORD | TWITTER | FACEBOOK

Author: pixietoken
Title: ✅[ANN] [Pre-TGE] Pixie (PXE) Discover, Pay and Earn Rewards – Download the App!
Body: Thanks for your interest dzkrb1966 in Pixie.  We already have a rapidly growing platform of independent businesses and users that are conducting fiat payments through our existing conventional platform. However, the key point which I think you raise fairly is how can we ensure that the utility of the token is successful once it's introduced.  We have designed our currency to ensure that we distribute it quickly and directly into the hands (wallets) of our ever-growing network, both businesses and users. We want both parties to begin trading with it and allow business to begin issuing rewards to their loyal customer base.  As we continue to expand our network of independent businesses and users, the cycle increases to ensure greater liquidity and utility, two key drivers of an increase in value for our token.

Title: ✅[ANN] [Pre-TGE] Pixie (PXE) Discover, Pay and Earn Rewards – Download the App!
Body: What is Pixie? Pixie is a fully operational discovery, payment and reward platform that connects independent businesses to people, so they can trade freely, quickly and securely anywhere in the world.  What is PXE? The PXE token will underpin our growing community of independent businesses and local explorers across the globe by providing a decentralised local currency that allows direct payments and rewards between them.  Whitelisting Now Open Pre-sale starts August 1st  Whitelist yourself now! Visit: https://pixietoken.co/
